verses.plain: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.

tokens.t: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.

verses.plain: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.

tokens.t: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.

verses.plain: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.

tokens.t: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.

verses.plain: Behold, God is mine helper: the Lord is with them that uphold my soul.

tokens.t: with them that uphold my soul.

verses.plain: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.

tokens.t: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.

verses.plain: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O LORD; for it is good.

tokens.t: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O

verses.plain: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen his desire upon mine enemies.

tokens.t: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen

footnotes.text: mine…: Heb. those that observe me
